triangle_vertices = np.array([[1, 1, 1], [0.99, 1, 1], [1, 1, 0.99]])
expected = np.array([[610, 190], [610, 191], [610, 192], [610, 193], [610, 
    194], [611, 190], [611, 191], [611, 192], [611, 193], [612, 190], [612,
    191], [612, 192], [613, 190], [613, 191], [614, 190]])
try:
    np.testing.assert_equal(self.renderer.rasterize(triangle_vertices, self
        .cam), expected)
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
